channel.title: Where do i add a door in a Black Spartan source?
channel.description:
Hi. i'm trying to add a tut island.
I have already put in all the NPC's in the spawn list.
But now i only have to add the doors and the NPC's talkings.
i have made those already in TextPad.
but now i dont know where to put it into my source.
*Please note that its a Blacnk Spartan source. - i have tryd serveral TuT's but they all say i need to look for zammy mage. Witch i dont got in my source.
This is an exsample of the first door.
[code]if (objectID == 6743) // Tut island door 1 { ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, -2); [/code]
Please help me on this one.

item.title: Where do i add a door in a Black Spartan source?
item.dc:creator: @J03RY J03RY
item.description:
@J03RY wrote:

I know to add it into client.java , but i just want to be sure not to fuck up the server.
i’l try looking for global objects. i’l edit my post later.

EDIT:

well i still dont know where to place it.
is there anyone that uses a spartanscape source that could like tell me what to put in my search field?
so i know what would be the best place to add it ?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 03:40:56 PM[/size][hr]Never mind. i got it all figured out.

wow i’m gonna be good now that i know its that easy to find sh*t in your client

Read full topic
